# Description of DataSchema variable

The description of harmonised variable is the following:

* Short name: `cog_imm_c`
* Variable label: `Cognition - Immediate recall - Continuous`
* Variable description: `Immediate recall of a list of common nouns. The number of words is exactly the same as in the study-specific variable.`
* Domain: `Health status and functional limitations`
* Value type: `Continuous`
* Category missings: 

**Code** | **Category Label**
----| ------------------
991 | CAPI/interviewer error
992 | Impute
993 | Disable to measure
994 | Not attempt/not done
995 | Does not answer
996 | Not applicable
997 | Refuse
998 | Do not know
999 | Missing



* Short name: `cog_imm`
* Variable label: `Cognition - Immediate recall`
* Variable description: `Immediate recall of a list of common nouns. Discrete variable: value 0 = <=25%; value 1 = >25%.`
* Domain: `Health status and functional limitations`
* Value type: `Categorical`
* Category coding:

**Code** | **Category Label**
-------- | ------------------
0        | <=25%
1        | >25%

* Category missings: 

**Code** | **Category Label**
----| ------------------
991 | CAPI/interviewer error
992 | Impute
993 | Disable to measure
994 | Not attempt/not done
995 | Does not answer
996 | Not applicable
997 | Refuse
998 | Do not know
999 | Missing


```{r lab, echo=FALSE}
ds_label <- "Immediate recall"
ds_label_cog_imm_c <- "Immediate recall of a list of common nouns. The number of words is exactly the same as in the study-specific variable"
ds_label_cog_imm <- "Immediate recall of a list of common nouns. Discrete variable: value 0 = <=25%; value 1 = >25%"
```


# Data process

## Spain

### Wave 1 

#### Study-specific variable description

The study-specific variables elected to be harmonised is:

* Name: `q2525_recal1`
* Label: `Recall 1`
* Categories:
   + `0 - 10`
* Missings
   + `-8 = Do not know`
   + `NA`

```{r assign Spain w1, echo=FALSE}
opal.assign.table.tibble(o, 'COURAGE_Spain_w1_cog_imm','Courage.Courage_Spain_w1', variables=list('q2525_recal1'), missings = TRUE)
COURAGE_Spain_w1_cog_imm <-opal.execute(o,'COURAGE_Spain_w1_cog_imm')
```

```{r local Spain w1, echo=FALSE}
vari <- COURAGE_Spain_w1_cog_imm$q2525_recal1
kable(Continuous_summary(var = vari, missing_values = c(-8))[3], caption = "Immediate recall continuous")
kable(Continuous_summary(vari, missing_values = c(-8))[2], caption = "Values")
pander(Continuous_summary(vari, missing_values = c(-8))$summary, caption = "Summary")
ggplot(COURAGE_Spain_w1_cog_imm, aes(x=factor(q2525_recal1))) + geom_bar(stat="count", width=0.4, fill="steelblue") + xlab("Cognition - Immediate recall") + ylab("Frequency")
```

#### Harmonisation algorithm

To compute the harmonize variable `cog_imm_c` from the study-specific variable the missing values have to be recoded as follows:

* `-8 into 998`
* `NA into 999`

To compute the harmonized variable `cog_imm` from `cog_imm_c` it has to be recoded as follows:

* `cog_imm_c <=25% into 0`
* `cog_imm_c >25% into 1` 

**R script**

```{r harmo Spain w1}
##cog_imm_c
COURAGE_ds_spain_w1 <- tibble(id=COURAGE_Spain_w1_cog_imm$id)
COURAGE_ds_spain_w1$cog_imm_c <- car::recode(COURAGE_Spain_w1_cog_imm$q2525_recal1, "-8=998; NA=999")
COURAGE_ds_spain_w1$cog_imm_c <- labelled(COURAGE_ds_spain_w1$cog_imm_c, labels = c(Missing=999, Do_not_know=998, Refuse=997, Not_applicable=996, Does_not_answer=995,  Not_attempt_not_done=994, Disable_to_measure=993, Impute=992, CAPI_interviewer_error=991))

##cog_imm
Q <- quantile(car::recode(COURAGE_ds_spain_w1$cog_imm_c, "999=NA; 998=NA"), probs = 1/4, na.rm = TRUE, names = FALSE)

COURAGE_ds_spain_w1$cog_imm <- car::recode(COURAGE_ds_spain_w1[[2]], "0:Q=0; (Q+1):10=1")
COURAGE_ds_spain_w1$cog_imm <- labelled(COURAGE_ds_spain_w1[[3]], labels = c("<=25%"=0, ">25%"=1, "Missing"=999, "Do not know"=998, "Refuse"=997, "Not applicable"=996, "Does not answer"=995,  "Not attempt not done"=994, "Disable to measure"=993, "Impute"=992, "CAPI interviewer error"=991))
```

#### Statistical description of the new harmonised variable
```{r descript Spain w1, echo=FALSE}
vari <- COURAGE_ds_spain_w1$cog_imm_c
kable(Continuous_summary(var = vari, missing_values = c(991, 992, 993, 994, 995, 996, 997, 998, 999))[3], caption = "Immediate recall continuous")
kable(Continuous_summary(vari, missing_values = c(991, 992, 993, 994, 995, 996, 997, 998, 999))[2], caption = "Values")
pander(Continuous_summary(vari, missing_values = c(991, 992, 993, 994, 995, 996, 997, 998, 999))$summary, caption = "Summary")
ggplot(COURAGE_ds_spain_w1, aes(x=factor(vari))) + geom_bar(stat="count", width=0.4, fill="steelblue") + xlab(ds_label) + ylab("Frequency")

vari <- COURAGE_ds_spain_w1$cog_imm
kable(Categorical_summary(vari, missing_values = c(991, 992, 993, 994, 995, 996, 997, 998, 999))[3], caption = "Cognition - Immediate recall")
kable(Categorical_summary(vari, missing_values = c(991, 992, 993, 994, 995, 996, 997, 998, 999))[1], caption = "Category")
kable(Categorical_summary(vari, missing_values = c(991, 992, 993, 994, 995, 996, 997, 998, 999))[2], caption = "Type of missing")
ggplot(COURAGE_ds_spain_w1, aes(x=factor(cog_imm))) + geom_bar(stat="count", width=0.4, fill="steelblue") + xlab("Cognition - Immediate recall") + ylab("Frequency")
```

#### Validation
```{r crosstabulation Spain w1, echo=FALSE}
Continous <- c(sum(na.omit(COURAGE_ds_spain_w1[[2]])<=Q), sum(na.omit(COURAGE_ds_spain_w1[[2]])>Q & na.omit(COURAGE_ds_spain_w1[[2]])<900), sum(na.omit(COURAGE_ds_spain_w1[[2]])==998), sum(na.omit(COURAGE_ds_spain_w1[[2]])==999))
Dicotomic <- table(COURAGE_ds_spain_w1[[3]], useNA = "ifany")
C <- rbind(Continous,Dicotomic)
colnames(C) <- c("0:3->0","4:20->1","-8->998", "NA->999") 
kable(C, caption = "Continuous vs Dichotomous")
```


```{r importOPAL Spain w1, echo=FALSE}
label(COURAGE_ds_spain_w1$cog_imm_c) <- ds_label_cog_imm_c
label(COURAGE_ds_spain_w1$cog_imm) <- ds_label_cog_imm

#opal.assign.data(o, 'COURAGE_ds_spain_w1', COURAGE_ds_spain_w1)
#opal.symbol_import(o,'COURAGE_ds_spain_w1', project='_Athlos_Harm_Dataset')
cog_imm <- COURAGE_ds_spain_w1
save(cog_imm, file = "../RData/spain_w1/cog_imm.RData")
rm(cog_imm)

COURAGE_m_ds_spain_w1 <- COURAGE_ds_spain_w1
COURAGE_m_ds_spain_w1$cog_imm <- car::recode(COURAGE_m_ds_spain_w1$cog_imm, "c(991, 992, 993, 994, 995, 996, 997,998, 999)=NA")
COURAGE_m_ds_spain_w1$cog_imm_c <- car::recode(COURAGE_m_ds_spain_w1$cog_imm_c, "c(991, 992, 993, 994, 995, 996, 997,998, 999)=NA")
#opal.assign.data(o, 'COURAGE_m_ds_spain_w1', COURAGE_m_ds_spain_w1)
#opal.symbol_import(o,'COURAGE_m_ds_spain_w1', project='_Athlos_Harm_Dataset')
```

```{r harmo Finland w1}
COURAGE_ds_fin_w1$cog_imm <- labelled(COURAGE_ds_fin_w1[[3]], labels = c("<=25%"=0, ">25%"=1, "Missing"=999, "Do not know"=998, "Refuse"=997, "Not applicable"=996, "Does not answer"=995,  "Not attempt not done"=994, "Disable to measure"=993, "Impute"=992, "CAPI interviewer error"=991))
```

```{r descript Finland w1, echo=FALSE}
kable(Continuous_summary(vari, missing_values = c(991, 992, 993, 994, 995, 996, 997, 998, 999))[2], caption = "Values")
pander(Continuous_summary(vari, missing_values = c(991, 992, 993, 994, 995, 996, 997, 998, 999))$summary, caption = "Summary")

kable(Categorical_summary(vari, missing_values = c(991, 992, 993, 994, 995, 996, 997, 998, 999))[3], caption = "Cognition - Immediate recall")
```
